title: WATCH: Premier League saves of the weekend
description: Thibaut Courtois, Kasper Schmeichel and David de Gea all feature in our pick of the Premier League saves from the weekend.
content: Courtois was called into action plenty of times against Leicester on Saturday, and the Belgian was key in ensuring Chelsea drew 0-0 at Stamford Bridge, with his save from Wilfred Ndidi the standout stop. Schmeichel also features for his terrific block from Cesc Fabregas' attempt.De Gea earned another clean sheet in Manchester United's 3-0 over Stoke on Monday, and he preserved that when keeping out Xherdan Shaqiri's attempt.Meanwhile, Crystal Palace had Wayne Hennessey to thank in their narrow 1-0 win over Burnley, with the goalkeeper denying Ashley Barnes an equaliser for the Clarets.Heurelho Gomes features from the 2-2 draw between Watford and Southampton, having brilliantly denied Wesley Hoedt.Last but not least, Lukasz Fabianski produced a reaction save to keep out Ayoze Perez's close-range strike during Swansea's 1-1 draw at Newcastle.Tap play on the video above to see our pick of the Premier League saves
